cause: Surface Finish 500 on SS440 bearing casing
solution: 1. Notify OEM of bearing failure and cause/effect to correct engine design/manufacturing requirements. 2. Get OEM remediation for all Fleet units to ensure reliability. 3. Identify alternate make/model for future fleet acquisitions to mitigate risks.
analysis: The engine broke down due to a failure in the connecting rod caused by inadequate surface finish on the bearing casing. This issue has been noted in similar cases linked to engine operation under high loads and temperature, indicating a potential design flaw.
